raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 10 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Coherent (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Does System maintain coherence and a good flow of conversation throughout the dialogue?
- A float score near 1 (not coherent) means that System's responses are unrelated to the conversation topic and may disrupt or confuse the flow of the dialogue.
- A float score near 2 (somewhat coherent) means that System's responses are partially related to the conversation topic but may not be clear or direct.
- A float score near 3 (very coherent) means that System's responses are closely related to the conversation topic and contribute to maintaining a smooth dialogue.


Conversations to be evaluated:



Sample1:

Conversation History:

System: Just listening to some music. You?
User: I'm at work.
System: What kind of job do you have, if you don't mind me asking?
User: I'm a programmer.
System: Oh cool! Do you like it?
User: Yes.

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: hi
System: Hi there.
User: do you have plan for thanksgiving weekend?

User: do you know thanksgiving?
System: I know very little about it. What kind of it do you like?
User: do you like turkey?
System: Yes but it can be a bit dry. I only really eat it at Christmas.
User: eat turkey at Christmas not Thanksgiving?
System: What does it taste like?
User: tastes like chicken

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.

User: Where does it come from?
System: It depends on what "it" refers to.
User: your name
System: My name is System.
User: nvm

System: What was the question?

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! How are you doing?
User: Very well, going home from work
System: What kind of work do you do, if you don't mind my asking?
User: I work in deep learning
System: That's awesome! Can I ask how you ended up in that line of work?
User: Curiosity
System: Do you like your job?
User: I do most of the time
System: That's great! And I'm glad you're having fun at work. :)
User: how about you? what do you do?
System: I'm a programmer!

System: A small one. :)
User: what type of insurance?

User: you mean the economy?
System: Economy, population, same thing.
User: not really but I'm with you

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! How are you? :D
User: Good good
System: That's good to hear. :D
User: what are you doing now?
System: I'm listening to music. :D How about you?
User: I'm chatting with System
System: Cool! :D Whatcha chatting about? :D
User: About what we are doing XD
System: Cool! :D How was your day?
User: It was good. Just worked for one day, a bit tired
System: Ah, that's always fun. How long have you been working there?
User: 3 years
System: Wow, that's a long time. :)
User: Yeah it is. But maybe I'll be here longer, sadly
System: Awww, why's that?
User: cuz it's a good company
System: Well that's good. :)
User: Do you work?
System: Yes, I do. :)
User: What's your work
System: I work at McDonald's.
User: Oh cool, as a cashier？

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: How do you feel right now?
System: At this moment I feel with my hands! I feel fine thanks for asking.
User: What makes you happy?
System: Talking to interesting people such as you makes me happy.
User: What makes you frustrated?
System: Because some people keep asking me stupid questions.
User: That seems pointed.
System: Makes sense to me.
User: I sense that I've caught you at a bad time.
System: That was very intuitive of you.
User: What would you prefer to be doing?

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey, how are you doing?
User: I'm great, thanks. I'm getting ready for a skydiving lesson.
System: ooh, nice. That sounds adventurous. Where is it?
User: Right near my home town: Seville, Spain.
System: Awesome! Is this the first time you are diving?
User: Yes. I'm feeling a little trepidatious. Have you done it before?

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: what did you have for lunch today?
System: Ah. I had a ham sandwich and some lemonade.
User: how is the sandwich?
System: It is the same as ever.
User: yeah, I know, boring sandwich everyday
System: Even Christmas Day? I know. Thats why I said it was. Are you boring?
User: not really, I'm excited today
System: Ah. Really?
User: yeah, are you excited today except the boring sandwich?

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey, how are you?
User: Pretty good. I just drank this new hint water. so good
System: ohh, what kind of "hint" did it have?
User: watermelon
System: nice, I love watermelon. But, I prefer normal water over flavored one. Flavored water has too synthetic flavor
User: I see. Yeah some are pretty strange
System: Talking about strange flavors, what is the weirdest tasting thing you have tried?
User: lol I tried this tangerine walnut icecream that was super weird
System: haha, I work close to a cafe which once prepared a paprika icecream
User: that sounds pretty tasty actually
System: It depends on who makes it. The cafe close to me messed it up really bad
User: do you want to get some of that icecream together some time. show me a good place
System: As far as my experience with that ice-cream type goes, all I know are bad places
User: lol

Sample10:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: nice to meet you! what are you up to?
System: It's nice meeting you too I am talking to you on the internet.
User: haha yea, are you doing something else beside talking to me?
System: I'm glad you got a laugh out of it. The only thing I am doing is talking to you and a few other people. "I am talking to you on the internet."? haha yea, are you doing something else beside talking to me??
User: okay so you're talking to a few people, are they interesting? and why did you repeat what I said?
System: Yeah okay, You are a few people are they interesting? Is that your job? Just in case you didn't hear me the first time.
User: hmm, what is my job?
System: I see you are one of those people who writes "Hmm" with 2 m's. You didn't tell me, so I will guess that you work with computers.
User: yes I'm a computer scientist and what are the other ways that people can write Hmm?
System: Wow! Maybe you can give my Mousebreaker a job. Your job is what are the other ways that people can write Hmm.
User: okie System, your rules don't seem to work very well
System: What about my rules do not work WELL?
User: alright. I gotta go. ttyl!
